audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Advanced End Users

name: GM4JJJ Shack 4 Digit LED UTC Clock
short_description:
A 4 digit LED clock built with an Arduino Uno and a DS1307 Real Time Clock module. The 4 digit, 7 segment LED display is common cathode, type number 5461AS.
Time is initially set by serial command from a computer connected to the Arduino USB port. After a period of running, further time setting will automatically calculate the gain / loss of the clock and apply a correction to the displayed time.

The "Processing" software for setting the clock time is available in the Files section.

The Arduino "Sketch" software is available in the Code section. 

Schematic and Breadboard Diagram in Files area.
summary: Arduino Uno based Digital Clock with battery backup RTC
